author: markt
msg: Improve JNDI debug logging for lookups.

author: lhein
msg: On failures withing the processing of the polled file the lock isn't released. If for example the file is locked by the underlying OS the processing may fail with an IO exception. In that case the file will never again be processed unless you restart the polling process. Now the lock is released upon failure and another thread may try to process the file again.

author: lhein
msg: added a method for using channels to copy from input to output stream. Adapted the binary file marshaler to use this method. Should be faster than the copy logic which was there before.
